description:
1st grader of Mihama academy, an innocent and carefree girl. For some unexplainable reasons, it`s hard to understand her personality. In general, she can be explained in one word, "Fool", but sometime her speeches and behaviors make people shed cold sweat. For that uniqueness, most of people who talk with her for 5 minutes will say "This girl is awful". She adores Yuuji as a brother and Amane as a sister. She calls Yuuji "Onii-chan". Although she has her own room in the dormitory, she always stays in Amane`s room. She always wears knee-socks with 2 different colors. Because of her parents work, she stayed in foreign countries until she was 6 so she can talk English. Her family is rumored to be a large financial clique which controls the underworld of Japan, but rarely people know the unhappiness which she suffered for born in such a troublesome family. She used to be the successor of Irisu family but her inheritance right was transferred to her younger sister, Irisu Sarina, after she suffered a mental shock in an accident. Despite all of that, she still has 70 millions yen as her own property.
Her representative fruit is apple.
Source: VNDB
name: Irisu Makina
